description.text: SleepyTime Studio was created by a group of university students with the aim to create and publish a Horror game. We were no more than 9 individuals with a software development background.
As a gameplay and asset programmer, I was tasked with designing and implementing the following:

items: Adding functionalities to all interactable in the game.
I have also had the chance to make some 3D models using 3ds Max.

description.text: Waterfall methodologies were applied during development.
